text: allah kiliti dæyin pivituru dæ ven karana tek numbala (dænata) kavara tattvayaka pasu vanne da evan tattvayaka ma visvasavantayin va atahæra damannek noviya. emen ma adrsyamana dæ numbalata penva dimata da allahta (avasya) noviya. enamut tama dharma dutayingen taman abhimata kala ayava allah tora ganne ya. ebævin numbala allah va da ohuge dharma dutayin va da visvasa karanu. numbala visvasa karanne nam tavada biya bætimat vanne nam evita numbalata mahat vu pratiphala æta
